text: Hey everyone :wave: we just pushed up a new minor release of boilerplate (<https://github.com/HubSpot/cms-theme-boilerplate/releases/tag/v3.1.0>) that fixes a couple of bugs and introduces some minor feature enhancements (cleaning up some code, adding titles to system templates, and adding author/tag listing headings to the blog lisitngs module). Please check out the release notes for more details!
are we able to use environment variables with building a vuejs application?
